settings.editor: Atlantis The Palm Catagory,Dubai Creek Dolphinarium

Did you ever dream of meeting real dolphins? Have you ever had a memorable Dolphin experience? Dolphins are certainly one of the cutest animals in the world. Their friendly and welcoming nature makes them safe and fun for human interaction. The cute bottlenose dolphins in Dubai offer a warm welcome to all human visitors. Their friendliness and cute stunts are sure to make your day. There are 2 locations in Dubai where you can have a meet and greet session with dolphins. They are Atlas Village and Dubai Dolphinarium.

tabs.tab_content:
Atlas Village Dolphins Meet & Greet

  • 20-30 minutes interaction with dolphin.
  • wetsuit/towel/locker will be provided for the dolphin session
  • Complimentary access to the Atlantis Aquaventure Waterpark
  • Photo session with Dolphins
  • Touch, hug or kiss the Dolphins
  • Private transportation can be arranged for extra charges

Dubai Dolphinarium Meet & Greet

  • 10 minutes of dry interaction with dolphins
  • Hug, kiss, and play with the dolphins while learning about them
  • Supervision of their expert trainers
  • Get a complimentary photo as a souvenir of the day
  • Private transportation if selected during reservation (on extra cost)

Exclusions

  • Dolphin Planet Tickets
  • Creek park Entry Tickets
  • No Food Voucher In Atlas Village
  • No Towel Voucher in Atlas Village

  • Private transportation can be arranged for extra charges

settings.editor:
Atlas Village

You can’t imagine how friendly dolphins are and at Atlantis, The Palm Resort, the Dolphin Program gives you a one-of-kind opportunity to get up and close to dolphins. After an orientation program that’s truly engaging, brace yourself for a very relaxing interactive session with one of the amiable dolphins. It’s a wonderful experience that lasts 10-15 minutes and lets you make a friend from the animal world. The Dolphin Photo Fun sessions make for a truly fun-filled activity for people from all age groups. Kids enjoy it the most as they get a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to be close to what is surely one of the most adorable of animals. Book your tour for this amazing Dolphin meet and greet experience.

Dubai Dolphinarium

Dubai Dolphinarium is located near the Bur Dubai region of Dubai. It is a fully controlled, air conditioned indoor dolphinarium that serves as the home for several dolphins and seals. Visitors can indulge in various interactions with these dolphins like photo sessions, dolphin shows and meet and greet with dolphins. Dubai Dolphinarium is certainly a must visit place for animal lovers and marine life enthusiasts. Learn about dolphin behaviour, habitat, life cycle and a lot more when you visit Dubai Dolphinarium.

About The Activity

What’s more, you won’t even need to get into the water as the dolphin will take all the trouble to come up to you for a cool snap.

While you won’t get wet during the encounter with the amazing dolphins, you’ll still be able to not just touch a dolphin, but also hug it. You may also kiss one and what’s more, you may also have a handshake by grabbing one of its fins! Your close encounter with a dolphin experience gives you a peek into how chirpy, intelligent, and vibrant these lovely mammals can be. Before you leave, you’ll have a professional photographer take a wonderful photograph of you with a dolphin. Because it will be a heart-warming souvenir to remember the meet and greet experience.

Whether you are looking for a perfect surprise for your loved ones or just a memorable outing, the Dolphin meet and greet session is one activity that’s a must on your bucket list.

Some important information

  • We pick you up only from your Dubai hotel/residence, not from the airport
  • We can pick you up from any location other than your hotel/residence on payment of an additional surcharge. You can also take desertdaytravels's transportation services.
  • You can not bring any food, beverages, or alcohol into the premises
  • Since the Atlantis Aquaventure is a facility with shallow water, you’ll have to enter every pool feet first as a safety precaution. No diving is allowed
  • You’ll be provided with complimentary life jackets at the towel rental locations
  • No individual selling of any ticket for this activity to any end consumer is allowed at a rate less than its gate price. Discounts can be offered only in combination with other activities and its standalone price shall not be featured at a rate lower than the gate price under any circumstances at Atlantis.
  • The bookings can be made only subject to availability

Why should you opt for the Dolphin Meet and Greet Experience?

  • It gives you a chance to know the immensely sharp dolphins more closely—a unique experience indeed
  • The activity takes place at Atlas Village, a top attraction inside the Atlantis, the Palm Hotel and Dubai Dolphinarium at Creek Park.
  • While it’s a dry program, you can still touch, hug, or even kiss a dolphin
  • It’s a fun-filled activity suitable for all, including kids
  • It’s an activity of 15 minutes and is inclusive of an engaging orientation program conducted by a specialist in marine mammals that tells you a lot about dolphins
  • You can finally end the day with a photo in the company of a friendly dolphin, a great souvenir to remember an amazing day by

The cancellation policy

  • A 100% cancellation charge shall apply upon any cancellation of a booking.  We do not offer any grace period.

The child policy

  • Children who are less than 1.2 meters in height and below 7 years of age have to pay child rates (Atlas Village).
  • Children below 2 years of age have free entry.
  • Children who are more than 1.2 meters in height and above 8 years of age have to pay standard rates.
  • Children below 5 years of age can not participate in the meet and greet dolphins Dubai activity at Dubai Dolphinarium.
  • A paying adult should accompany children under 12 years of age at Dubai Dolphinarium.

The best time to visit

The UAE, including Dubai, is hot and humid for much of the year. It’s very uncomfortable outdoors and the heat gets unbearable at times. It’s between October and February that Dubai is at its best. The weather is pleasant and there’s a gentle breeze blowing. However, it’s at this time of the year itself that the city holds the Dubai Shopping Festival. Also, schools are on vacation. So, the city’s pretty crowded. If you can take the crowd in your stride, the best time to visit these tourist attractions in Dubai is between October and February. It’s an amazing city beckoning you to an unforgettable holiday.

FAQs

Q. What is the Dolphin Meet & Greet Dubai experience?

The Dolphin Meet & Greet Dubai offers an interactive session with friendly bottlenose dolphins at either Atlas Village or Dubai Dolphinarium.

Q. Where can I meet & greet dolphins in Dubai?

You can meet & greet dolphins at two locations in Dubai: Atlas Village at Atlantis, The Palm, and Dubai Dolphinarium.

Q. How long is the Dolphin Meet & Greet Dubai session?

The Dolphin Meet & Greet Dubai session typically lasts for about 15 minutes, including an engaging orientation program.

Q. What activities are included in the Dolphin Meet & Greet Dubai?

The Dolphin Meet & Greet Dubai includes touching, hugging, kissing, and taking photos with dolphins without getting into the water.

Q. Is the Dolphin Meet & Greet Dubai suitable for kids?

Yes, the Dolphin Meet & Greet Dubai is a fun-filled activity suitable for all ages, although specific child policies apply regarding age and height.

Q. Do I need to know how to swim for the Dolphin Meet & Greet Dubai?

No, swimming is not required for the Dolphin Meet & Greet Dubai as it is a dry program where dolphins come to you for interaction.

Q. What should I wear for the Dolphin Meet & Greet Dubai?

Wear comfortable clothing appropriate for the weather, and note that you won't need to enter the water during the dolphin experience.

Q. Can I take photos during the Dolphin Meet & Greet Dubai?

Yes, a professional photographer will capture your memorable dolphin experience, and you can purchase the photos as a souvenir.
